name: Enemy buddies
description:
The game will launch in "fullscreen" to get the complete experience!

Character movement: 

Moving around: WASD

Aim: Mouse

Shoot: Mouse Button One

The enemies deal damage based on how many of them are present on the board, right now it caps at 20. They shoot out projectiles with a colour outline the same as the enemy sprite.

This is my first ever GameJam and also my first "completed" game, so bare with me! The UI is extremely lacking and right now the game auto-starts when first opened. There is also only one level, but as soon as one enemy dies a new one spawns making it possible to grind the enemies until the player dies. Oh right, and sometimes the player will get a force and auto-move, but if you keep moving that problem is solved! :D
